Hi! I'm James Ferrett, a web developer / copywriter / graphic designer dedicated to bringing your digital visions to life. Proficient in JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS, I wield these languages to craft seamless, user-centric websites. My journey didn't start or end with coding. For the past nine years, I've immersed myself in the worlds of copywriting and graphic design, honing a way with words and an eye for aesthetics. This fusion of skills means I don't just create functional websites; I engineer content-rich and visually captivating digital campaigns that resonate with end-users. What truly sets me apart is my problem-solving. I love deciphering unique customer challenges and tailoring solutions that fulfil needs clients weren't even aware of. I love when the art of design meets the logic of programming. Together, let's transform ideas into creative digital campaigns. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to collaborating with you.
